text:
Dear Mr.Alex Dupont,
My name is Alex Dupont and I am currently studying at Rennes 2. Next year, I would like to studying abroad and I made up my mind to choose Paris. It would be a great opportunity for me to learn about new cultures as Paris counts many types of it. This choice is motivated by the fact that, in my opinion, speak fluently another language than our native one is essential in the world we live in now. Improve my level in English would certainly help me to meet foreign people and to create new relationship. It would also upgrade my own culture as it would give me an access to another type of thoughts. Indeed, being on my own and learn to do things by myself will make me a more responsable person and it's a quality everyone need to have. As everyone says that landscapes in Paris are breathtaking, I can't wait to see them. I will not be there to do beach-bumping but to give me food for thought. This opportunity is a chance I don't want to loose.
In the future, I would like to be an anthropologist so discover a different way to live is a good base for the next step of my career. I would rather prefer to go an entire school year than only a semester but I would take what you can give to me.
I am looking forward to received your answer and I hope it would be a favorable one.
